ResearchProjectDef.label: Starport
ResearchProjectDef.description: Master the construction and maintenance methods of Starport and Battlecruiser. Unlock the construction of basic buildings

ResearchProjectDef.label: Machine Gun
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Master the manufacturing technology of machine gun weapons for assembling Battlecruiser and unlock the construction of Machine Gun Module.
The machine gun outputs with an efficiency of about 7 rounds /s.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Rocket
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Master the manufacturing technology of Rocket weapons for assembling Battlecruiser and unlock the construction of Rocket Modules.
The Rocket is loaded every 9s, and the fuel left can continuously burn the enemies standing above.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Laser
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Master the manufacturing technology of laser weapons for assembling Battlecruiser and unlock the construction of Laser Modules.
The laser weapon is charged every 5S. After charging, it continuously emits 5 laser beams, causing explosion.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Yamato Cannon
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Master the manufacturing technology of Yamato Cannon for assembling Battlecruiser and unlock the construction of Yamato Cannon Module.
The Yamato Cannon can only be fired through the command issued by Starport (command colddown for 10s), causing a ribbon explosion.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Compression System
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Master the compression technology to assemble the Battlecruiser and unlock the construction of Clearance Module.
When the Battlecruiser is recalled, half of the remaining materials will be compressed to cause a mixed explosion.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Energy Matrix Shield
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Master the energy matrix technology to assemble the Battlecruiser and unlock the construction of Shield Module.
When the energy matrix shield exists, it will preferentially absorb damage for the Battlecruiser.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ammunition Storage
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Master the manufacturing technology of the ammunition storage for assembling the Battlecruiser and unlock the construction of Ammunition Storage Module.
The ammunition storage can provide additional 50% ammunition for theBattlecruiser.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weapon Cooling System
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Master the cooling technology to assemble the Battlecruiser and unlock the construction of Cooling Module.
The cooling technology greatly reduces the difficulty of weapon cooling, and then increases the firing speed by 100%.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Warp
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Master the warp technology to assemble the Battlecruiser and unlock the construction of Warp Module.
The warp technology enables the Battlecruiser to reach the instant destination by warp.
